server-notes.md.content:
# Server Configuration Notes

## Production Server
- **IP**: 10.0.1.50
- **SSH Port**: 22
- **User**: deploy
- **Key**: ~/.ssh/prod_deploy_key

## Database Server
- **Host**: db.internal.example.com
- **Port**: 5432
- **Backup Schedule**: Daily at 2 AM UTC

## Redis Cache
- **Host**: cache.internal.example.com
- **Port**: 6379
- **Memory**: 4GB

## Deployment Commands

```bash
# Deploy to production
ssh deploy@prod 'cd /var/www/app && git pull && npm run build && pm2 restart all'

# Check logs
ssh deploy@prod 'pm2 logs --lines 100'

# Restart services
ssh deploy@prod 'sudo systemctl restart nginx'
```

## Monitoring
- Grafana: https://grafana.internal.example.com
- Prometheus: https://prometheus.internal.example.com

ssh-config.content:
# SSH Config for Project Servers

Host prod
    HostName 10.0.1.50
    User deploy
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/prod_deploy_key
    ForwardAgent yes

Host staging
    HostName 10.0.1.51
    User deploy
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/staging_key

Host db-tunnel
    HostName 10.0.1.50
    User deploy
    LocalForward 5433 db.internal:5432
